that rock Feelin' like A&J AND OG trying to make some good music Flash it only I got used to it Bought the ice the AP just to flex on y'all Feeling like my nigga Future made myself a boss [Hook:] with the goons Gotta take it in the living room We so high feel like we on shrooms Bought the rrari with the missing roof Please don't wake me from my foreign dream I buy rollies for the whole team Party, party, party like it's no tomorrow Codeine and rosay that's a ball Still blowing on that Mary Jane Started in the trap now we major league [Hook:] Still breaking bread with the goons Gotta take
